issue.title: Propulsion Configuration Tutorial T-thruster section is confusing

content.raw:
Yes - it was confusing.  I edited the tutorial to be a little less confusing, but it still is a bit strange.  I think the hope is that typical users will be able to use the three configurations without any edits, but also to explain it a bit to help folks that might want to come up with their own configurations.

We could definitely make modifying the propulsion a bit more clear with less levels of launch/xacro files, but I think we should push that to a 'nice to have' for a future release.
